description.value:
Consumable (Substance)

Muon gold is a lubricant-based spice that gives users intensified mental clarity and focus for a short time. As an action, you can apply this substance to a creature within 5 feet. For the next minute, the creature experiences a high that increases their current and maximum tech points by [[/r 2d4]]. At the end of the high, the creature must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or experience a low that lasts 1 hour, their current and maximum tech points are reduced by [[/r 2d4]]. At the end of the low, the creature must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw to resist addiction.

Â 

Muon gold

Muon gold is a lubricant-based spice that gives users intensified mental clarity and focus for a short time. As an action, you can apply this substance to a creature within 5 feet. For the next minute, the creature experiences a high that increases their current and maximum tech points by [[/r 2d3]]. At the end of the high, the creature must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or experience a low that lasts 10 minutes, their current and maximum tech points are reduced by [[/r 2d3]]. At the end of the low, the creature must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw to resist addiction.
